text: The VFX Festival is an annual conference dedicated to computer graphics and visual effects, taking place in London, and hosted by Escape Studios, part of Pearson College London. The event was originally founded in 2012. Official site Retrieved 21 March 2019 == See also == * ACM SIGGRAPH * FMX (Conference) == References == == External links == * Official website Category:Computer graphics conferences Category:Recurring events established in 2012
title: VFX Festival
